EmailTemplate.name: Spares ATR Price Discrepancy
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We have entered your order and updated the price to reflect current year catalog pricing. Any discounts which may apply will reflect in your final purchase price for each line item requested.
Please send an updated purchase order to ensure your records match with our current pricing. You will receive a separate order acknowledgement which identifies current pricing for your order.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
